resources.string:
Before you can use DeepskyLog Vela TCS, you will need to set some things up.
 
You need to set up:
• the connection with the Vela Arduino board
• your hardware components
• the connection with DeepskyLog

Vela connects to an Arduino using Bluetooth.

Make sure to:
• power on your Vela Arduino board
• enable Bluetooth on your phone or tablet
• make a connection with your Arduino
Select the Vela hardware components installed on your telescope
Vela uses DeepskyLog to fetch the data of the deep-sky objects you want to observe, to generate and use observing lists, ...
Please enter your DeepskyLog username and password.
This device does not have a bluetooth adapter. You will not be able to connect to the Vela hardware and will only have limited functionalities.
